snippet: Citigroup's effort to sell a consumer-lending business has collapsed in recent days, as wobbly markets and a lackluster economy shut down hopes for a deal.
abstract: Citigroup's effort to sell a consumer-lending business has collapsed in recent days, as wobbly markets and a lackluster economy shut down hopes for a deal.

headline.main: Citigroup's Deal to Sell OneMain Collapses
headline.print_headline: Citi Is Said To End Talks On Unit Sale
